## The data

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Make sure it's clean

```{r}
df <- read.csv("data/all.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
# Check for missing values
na_rows <- df[!complete.cases(df), ]
na_rows
nrow(df)
ncol(df)
```

### KDE

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(onBlock)) +
  geom_density()
ggplot(df, aes(Damage)) +
  geom_density()
ggplot(df, aes(Stun)) +
  geom_density()
```
